ConceptDef.label: AvP: Unblooded
ConceptDef.helpText: Some Yautja will be Unblooded. Which is to say they haven't got a worthy kill yet and have a permanent mood penalty because of it.\n\nIn order to get rid of this penalty, the Yautja needs to have the killing blow on a worthy prey (big predators, other pawns) and mark themselves with it.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Blooding
ConceptDef.helpText:
When a Yautja kill a worthy prey, they will have the option to mark themself with the blood of the kill.

Find the creature the pawn killed in its health tab. Then right-click the creature and choose the option to mark yourself with it. Once done, the Yautja will get a permanent boost to mood.

 As the Yautja kill stronger games, they will be able to mark themsleves again and get a better permanent mood bonus.

 If the creature the Yautja killed is accidently destroyed before they can amrk themself, you can use the blood of a similar prey to mark the Yautja.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Gauntlet
ConceptDef.helpText:
Basic Equipment taken into the field by almost all Yautja when hunting.

the most basic versions of which contain just the Wristblade and Self Destruct decive carried by all hunters, it can only be removed by the wearer willfully.

It can be upgraded via reseach to also contain the MediComp, Shard Injector and Cloaking Device.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Gauntlet - Wristblade
ConceptDef.helpText: One of the most Iconic peices of Yautja equipment, it is rare indeed to see a hunter without one.\n\nWhile the Hunter Gauntlet is equipped, the wearer gains an extra melee attack.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Gauntlet - Self Destruct
ConceptDef.helpText:
Yautja will go to extreme lengths to prevent their technology being scavenged by 'lesser' races, this device is one of the most extreme solutions.

The Device has two modes, a ten second timer and an instant trigger.

The Timer button acts as a toggle, so you can disarm it by clicking it again.

 WARNING!! There is No safty on the instant detonation trigger!.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Gauntlet - MediComp
ConceptDef.helpText:
With the MediComp Upgrade.

allows the wearer to tend to his own wounds in the field.

The tend quaility is the same as herbal medice.

There are no limits to how many time this can be used.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Gauntlet - Health Shards
ConceptDef.helpText:
With the Shard Injector Upgrade.

Allows the wearer to store and ustilize Health Shards to inject themself.

When used, a Health Shard heals one of the worst untended wounds on the pawn, but it will not replace lost or destroyed parts.

It can store a naximum of three Health Shards.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Gauntlet - Cloaking Device
ConceptDef.helpText:
One of the most well known and coverted peices of Yautja technology, Active Optical Cammoflage, it bends light around the user rendering them invisible.

When active, the cloaking device renders the user almost perfectly invisible.

However it can be disrupted by the wearer taking sufficent damage and rain can give away the wearers position.

 Rain and water Disruption planned but not yet implemented.

ConceptDef.label: AvP: Plasmacaster
ConceptDef.helpText: Another iconic peice of Yautja technology the plasmacaster offers a hands free ranged weapon.\n\nWhen active it will automaticlly target enemies in range, prioritizing the wearers target.
